backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining user profiles, journaling, squad groups, reporting, and invite‑based access with authorization checks and internal maps for state.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-readable feature evidence listing required content updates, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file providing high-level summaries of all major frontend source files for documentation or planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind OKLCH theme variables for light/dark modes with earth‑tone styling applied to base elements.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the root React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling auth flow, onboarding, routing, and global providers like theme and toasts.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalE: Full editor for creating, editing, sharing, and deleting journal entries with squad selection and validation.
Main app layout with navigation, mobile menu, user menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Handles user onboarding with invite code submission and disclaimer acceptance.
frontend/src/components/reports/ReportDi: Dialog for submitting abuse reports with reason selection and optional details.
frontend/src/content/disclaimer.ts: Exports multi‑paragraph disclaimer text clarifying the app’s unofficial status and OPSEC responsibilities.
frontend/src/content/modules.ts: Defines module interfaces and provides structured module content with quotes, interpretations, and prompts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for Internet Identity authentication, login, and identity management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks that wrap backend actor calls for user profiles, invites, journaling, reports, squads, and related mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, provides QueryClient, Internet Identity, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminReports.tsx: Admin page that lists community reports, allows status updates, and restricts access to admins.
frontend/src/pages/Guidelines.tsx: Page that fetches and displays community guidelines in a styled card layout.
frontend/src/pages/Journal.tsx: Journal page for viewing, creating, and editing personal or shared journal entries with optional module-driven prefill.
frontend/src/pages/Modules.tsx: Learning modules page that filters modules by category and links to starting journal reflections from module content.
frontend/src/pages/PublicLanding.tsx: Public landing page with branding, feature cards, a disclaimer, and Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsAbout.tsx: Settings page showing user profile details and app information including disclaimer and purpose.
frontend/src/pages/Squads.tsx: Lists user’s squads and provides dialogs to create or join squads using invite codes.
frontend/src/pages/SquadSharedEntries.ts: Displays a squad’s shared entries, member list, and controls for invite codes, reporting, and leaving the squad.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, including schema version, a narrative feature summary, and a detailed list of implemented features for authentication, onboarding, user profiles, journaling, sharing, and moderation.
